001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.json.encoder;
002
003import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.json.JsonBuffer.EXTENDED_F;
004
005import java.io.PrintWriter;
006import java.io.StringWriter;
007import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
008import java.time.Instant;
009import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.Objects;
012
013import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
014
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.KeyValues;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
017import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent;
018import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.LevelFormatter;
019import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
020import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
021import io.jstach.rainbowgum.json.JsonBuffer;
022import io.jstach.rainbowgum.json.JsonBuffer.ExtendedFieldPrefix;
023import io.jstach.rainbowgum.json.JsonBuffer.JSONToken;
024
025/**
026 * A JSON encoder in GELF format.
027 */
028public class GelfEncoder extends LogEncoder.AbstractEncoder<JsonBuffer> {
029
030        private final String host;
031
032        private final KeyValues headers;
033
034        private final boolean prettyprint;
035
036        private static final DateTimeFormatter timeFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_INSTANT;
037
038        GelfEncoder(String host, KeyValues headers, boolean prettyprint) {
039                super();
040                this.host = host;
041                this.headers = headers;
042                this.prettyprint = prettyprint;
043        }
044
045        /**
046         * Creates Gelf Encoder.
047         * @param name property name prefix.
048         * @param host host field in gelf.
049         * @param headers additional headers that will be prefix with "_".
050         * @param prettyPrint <code>true</code> will pretty prin the json, default is false.
051         * @return encoder.
052         */
053        @LogConfigurable(prefix = LogProperties.ENCODER_PREFIX)
054        static GelfEncoder of(@LogConfigurable.KeyParameter String name, String host, //
055                        @LogConfigurable.ConvertParameter("convertHeaders") @Nullable Map<String, String> headers,
056                        @Nullable Boolean prettyPrint) {
057                prettyPrint = prettyPrint == null ? false : prettyPrint;
058                host = Objects.requireNonNull(host);
059                // var _headers = KeyValues.of(convertHeaders(headers));
060                var _headers = KeyValues.of(headers == null ? Map.of() : headers);
061
062                return new GelfEncoder(host, _headers, prettyPrint);
063        }
064
065        static Map<String, String> convertHeaders(String headers) {
066                return LogProperties.parseMap(headers);
067        }
068
069        @Override
070        protected JsonBuffer doBuffer() {
071                return new JsonBuffer(this.prettyprint, ExtendedFieldPrefix.UNDERSCORE);
072        }
073
074        @Override
075        protected void doEncode(LogEvent event, JsonBuffer buffer) {
076                buffer.clear();
077                var formattedMessage = buffer.getFormattedMessageBuilder();
078                final String host = this.host;
079                event.formattedMessage(formattedMessage);
080                final String shortMessage = formattedMessage.toString();
081                Instant now = event.timestamp();
082                final double timeStamp = ((double) now.toEpochMilli()) / 1000;
083                @Nullable
084                String fullMessage = null;
085                var t = event.throwable();
086                if (t != null) {
087                        StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
088                        sw.write(shortMessage);
089                        sw.write("\n");
090                        t.printStackTrace(new PrintWriter(sw));
091                        fullMessage = sw.toString();
092                }
093                int level = levelToSyslogLevel(event.level());
094                buffer.write(JSONToken.OBJECT_START);
095                int index = 0;
096                index = buffer.write("host", host, index);
097                index = buffer.write("short_message", shortMessage, index);
098                index = buffer.write("full_message", fullMessage, index);
099                index = buffer.writeDouble("timestamp", timeStamp, index, 0);
100                index = buffer.writeInt("level", level, index, 0);
101                index = buffer.write("_time", timeFormatter.format(now), index);
102                index = buffer.write("_level", LevelFormatter.toString(event.level()), index);
103                index = buffer.write("_logger", event.loggerName(), index);
104                index = buffer.write("_thread_name", event.threadName(), index);
105                index = buffer.write("_thread_id", String.valueOf(event.threadId()), index);
106
107                if (t != null) {
108                        String tn = t.getClass().getCanonicalName();
109                        if (tn == null) {
110                                tn = t.getClass().getName();
111                        }
112                        index = buffer.write("_throwable", tn, index);
113                }
114
115                var kvs = event.keyValues();
116
117                /*
118                 * output headers
119                 */
120                for (int i = headers.start(); i >= 0; i = headers.next(i)) {
121                        String k = headers.key(i);
122                        if (kvs.getValue(k) != null) {
123                                continue;
124                        }
125                        String v = headers.value(i);
126                        index = buffer.write(k, v, index, EXTENDED_F);
127                }
128
129                /*
130                 * output MDC
131                 */
132                for (int i = kvs.start(); i >= 0; i = kvs.next(i)) {
133                        String k = kvs.key(i);
134                        String v = kvs.value(i);
135                        index = buffer.write(k, v, index, EXTENDED_F);
136                }
137
138                index = buffer.write("version", "1.1", index);
139
140                if (index > 0 && prettyprint) {
141                        buffer.writeLineFeed();
142                }
143                buffer.write(JSONToken.OBJECT_END);
144                buffer.writeLineFeed();
145        }
146
147        private int levelToSyslogLevel(Level level) {
148                /*
149                 * FROM LOGBACK The syslog severity of a logging event is converted from the level
150                 * of the logging event. The DEBUG level is converted to 7, INFO is converted to
151                 * 6, WARN is converted to 4 and ERROR is converted to 3.
152                 */
153                int r = switch (level) {
154                        case ERROR -> 3;
155                        case DEBUG -> 7;
156                        case INFO -> 6;
157                        case TRACE -> 7;
158                        case WARNING -> 4;
159                        case ALL -> 7;
160                        case OFF -> 0;
161                };
162                return r;
163        }
164
165}
